file_content.text: This is Watcher Six to the Hand of Jadus.
This is Watcher Six to Cipher Nine.
Initial target assessment is complete. Recommend you proceed to planet Belsavis for operational briefing.
On my way. Any details yet?
Understood.
My conclusions would be misleading.
Why don't we meet in the city? Do this over drinks....
[Flirt] Can't you brief me?
I'm sorry, but I'm not authorized to leave Citadel grounds.
You new Watchers aren't much for conversation.
You don't waste time, do you?
We can endeavor to be more sociable, if you like.
I was expecting to hear from Keeper or the Minister.
I don't take orders from you.
Apologies. I'm only following Keeper's instructions.
Uploading hyperspace coordinates and new security codes. Be aware that in times of war, clearance must be reconfigured every six hours.
Watcher Six out.
This whole conspiracy tripe--you really think we're gonna find something?
I don't think I'm in a position to judge.
They sent us summary briefing files, sir. Whatever you need, we'll be ready.
You haven't had it easy since coming on board. Everything that's happened....
Rough time to join us, Ensign.
Oh, I haven't followed half of it. But I'm committed to trying.
I think prudence is a virtue in times like these.
I've been reviewing the redacted briefing files. We have a challenge ahead of us.
I don't suppose you have any insight into the enemy?
Anything to share, doctor?
None, and believe me, Cipher, that disturbs me.
Work as a team and don't lose sight of our goals. Understood?
Let's stick together on this.
Keep it to yourselves. You'll follow orders, as always. Prepare for takeoff.
I don't want your opinions.
Yeah, all right. Strap in.
Is there something you require?
